description: Generate astrology charts from a date, time, and location. Explore planetary positions, houses, and interpretations for natal, transit, or event readings. Power horoscopes, reports, and personalized insights with accurate chart data.

capabilities.name: get_chart
capabilities.description:
A comprehensive astrology chart tool that provides detailed astrological data given a date, time, and location. 
  
  Returns detailed JSON data including:
  - Planetary positions with signs, houses, retrograde status, elements, and modalities
  - House cusps with detailed sign information  
  - Major planetary aspects (conjunctions, oppositions, trines, squares, sextiles, quincunx)
  - Ascendant and Midheaven with sign breakdowns
  - Speed calculations and retrograde detection
  - Element (Fire, Earth, Air, Water) and modality (Cardinal, Fixed, Mutable) classifications
